name: Wandering through the Night to Sidratul Muntaha
description:
This illustration permeates the story of Isra Miraj can strengthen faith and piety to Allah SWT. Because He is able to realize this extraordinary and beyond human comprehension event. The following is a description of Isra Miraj according to the Qur'an and hadith.

This work is momenting for celebration of H=N500K and is going 5000K follower in Twitter.
Basic work using Chinese ink, Drawing Pen, & Spidol on paper and then working through digital media just a little bit.
